Half-Life 2: Episode One is a first-person shooter game from Valve. It is a sequel to the previous game, Half-Life 2.

Half-Life 2: Episode One continues Gordon Freeman story from Half-Life 2 following the destruction of the Combine Citadel Dark Fusion reactor. In this episode you have to buy the resistance and yourself more time to escape City 17 and then escape with them, but it's not going to be a short one. I recommend this.

Half-Life 2: Episode One also focuses on AI companion. Alyx will accompany you 80% of the time and she is very helpful. But you also need to help her help you in some level.

Rating 10/10

So the order is half life 2, half life 2 episode 1 and half life 2 episode 2.

It took me 4 hours to play through this on hard, I think the graphics are improved significantly from half life 2. The gameplay is pretty much the same. It's very difficult to tell this apart from half life 2, it's pretty much the same game with the same nice gameplay and low budget eery sci fi feeling, the reason people love this game series so much. It's like the early archive x episodes but with shooters so it's awesome if you're in the right mood.

Get it bundled with the rest of the half life 2 games because it doesn't mean much on its own. Unless this is your first fps ever I think the hard difficulty is just right.
I'm happy to have left my first playthough this long, as Half life 3 could be a long way off I've got to spread out what little half-life 2 gooness there is left until then.

Nice storyline. A must play if you enjoyed HL2.
Just something to tide you over until Half-Life 3.

The episodic approach at story telling seems to work very well at shoring up the short comings of the base Half-Life 2's story. It forces the telling of a specific, condensed narrative, and consequently seems to have provided more story in its short life than the main game did otherwise. 

Episode 1 has the added bonus of utilizing the most entertaining game play mechanics of the main game, specifically the empowered gravity gun, which is sure to bring a gleeful smile to a gamer's lips.
Did you like HL2? Then you'll like this.

Ну что? Первое января, первый эпизод знаменитой второй части Half-Life 2. По сути это маленькое дополнение, купленнное мной за 30 рублей, в отличии от 2 части, собственно цена-качество =D 

Немного скучновато, всю работу за нас делает Алекс. Дополнение оно и есть дополнение. 

Кстати, всех с наступившим 2о14 годом!

P.S. Делает всё Алекс, потому что я проходил эту игру и сразу решил получить ачивку "одна пуля" или как-то так)

Holy crap! Is all i can say. There is only one complaint that i have and its the AI! Oh lord! She is only good for opening doors and killing. Which in Half Life you would think is enough. But this is the first Half Life, and Valve game, where i was frustrated by the difficulty. A challenge is one thing, but this is on a whole nother level. Alyx will literally not go where i want her to go, and for some reason this game has two(maybe more) instances where you are basically at the mercy of how good and how fast she can kill things. The scenes i am talking about are the ones where you turn the wheel to open the gate. And it would not be a problem if there were not so many antlions poking you causing the gate to close.

I would have thought that having someone follow you around would make the game a little bit easier, and she is pretty handy, but having her around is just a nuisance. In Half Life 2 there was a part where you "command" soldiers to navigate the streets to get to the Citadel. And just keeping them alive was a pain because they went where the pleased most of the time. But at least for them you had some sort of control. Ive found myself having to push her to go where i want her to.

The good things i have to say about this game were the graphics and story. I played Half Life 2 on Xbox and on my Xbox 360.  And that game came out a while ago, so the graphics werent as sharp or at least from my experience. But wow! The graphics were amazing! This is a beautiful game.

The story is great. I am already hooked and it is only the beginning stages of the game. Valve does a good job at making people want to continue the game just to find out what happens next in the story. In Half Life 2: episode one I am trying to bear the headache of having Alx join me because ever since i finished Half Life 2 many years ago I was left wanting more, especially with that ending!

Overall i do recommend this game but buyer beware that it will take a whole lot of patience and a whole lot of time to get used to her. The main reason i think buyers would like this game is for the story. If you care more about the story then this game satisfies that. It is definitely a game that gamers should play at least once in their life just to experience Alyx AI

this game is very brain racking and very fun for older children or very mature young children its very fun i suggest you get it right now or any of the other half life 2's like half llife 2 and episode 2 this is a amazing game.your charicter is gordon freeman he/you need to make it to your old freind barny and help him help citisens onto an escape train you get to battle zombies,headcrabs,soldiers,and antlions its just fun

Una excelente continuacíón a un esplendido juego. Episode One presenta una IA totalmente mejorada en la cual vamos a tener que trabajar en equipo con nuestra compania para lograr los objetivos. Presenta nuevos entornos, muchas situaciones de acción y adrenalina. La dificultad de este episodio es relativamente difícil. Posee el factor ''scare tactics'', no puedo negar que EP One me hizo asustarme en mas de una ocación, lo cual el ''miedo'', presente en solo este juego de HL2, es toque muy bueno y diferente de los demas. Episode One es demasiado corto y es una lástima, aún asi, es, como Half-Life 2 y Half-Life 2: Episode Two una obra de arte y un excelente juego.

Half-Life² : Episode One est la suite du deuxième opus étant un peu plus libre !

Alors je le trouve mieux que le deuxième bizzarement (sauf la fin bien évidemment :3) mais les deux ensembles restent très bons.

Ce jeu est surtout basé sur la peur (surtout le moment de la caverne !) !

Si je devais noter Half-Life² : Episode One, je lui donnerai 17/20 !

This is a good game for those looking for an extension to the Half Life 2 franchise. It doesn't feel like a crap dlc that's been rushed to simply bring the company in some extra cash. The game has had a considerable amount of thought put into it and it still feels like Half Life. It took me roughly 4 hours to complete this as there are some very challenging parts to this game and sometimes you just don't see what's in plain sight. Would recommend this game and looking forward to playing Episode 2.

Nachdem es Half-Life 2 Episode One für 3,49 auf Steam gab dachte ich mir schlag ich mal zu. Da Half-Life 2 mir auch schon sehr gut gefallen hat. Nachdem ich im Spiel meinen Autoführerschein gemacht habe (Mein Fahrlehrer war Dog) Cruiste ich ein wenig durch die Zitadelle. Einige Zeit später kam ich dann im dritten Kapitel Namens "Untergrund" an. Das geile an dem Kapitel waren: Die Dunkelheit und die Zombine ... Hehe versteht ihr? Combine + Headcrap = Zombine... Hehe ne? Äh ja den Spruch hat Alyx sich ausgedacht! Das Kapitel hatte einen leichten hauch von Horror was ich sehr geil fand, in Verbindung mit den Zombies wurde aus dem Kapitel ein wirklich geiles Spiel Erlebnis. In diesem Kapitel gab es auch Leuchtfackeln. Wenn man diese entzündete und seine eigene Taschenlampe ausschaltete war die Atmosphäre noch mal einen tacken düsterer und demnach auch genialer. Da gab es beispielsweise eine stelle wo wir einen Aufzug Reparieren sollten, als dieser wieder Funktionstüchtig war und etwas Zeit brauchte um herunter zu kommen kamen einige Zombies aus der Dunkelheit um uns Gesellschaft zu leisten. An diesem Punkt habe ich wieder eine der Leuchtfackeln gezündet und dabei kam ein ziemlich geiles Bild heraus. Was ich an den Zombine noch ziemlich cool finde sind ihre Geräusche die sie machen. Hört sich besonders bedrohlich an wenn man mal alle Lichtquellen ausmacht und dann im Dunkeln hockt. Wenn die dann auf einen zu gestürmt kommen bekommt man da schon mal Paranoia. Was ich ebenfalls ganz lustig finde ist das wenn sie einem zu nahe kommen eine Granate aus ihren Taschen holen und sie so lange in die Luft halten bis sie Explodieren.

Episode One, suite directe d'Half-life 2 est ce que nous pourrions grossièrement appeler un gros DLC aujourd'hui.
En effet on reprend les mêmes bases du jeu original pour juste offrir du contenu supplémentaire.
Le truc bien avec Episode One, c'est qu'on retrouve pendant un temps un peu l'ambiance de premier jeu, cloisonné et hésitant dans la progression le tout manquant de munitions. Cette extension est plutôt sympathique, honnête et continue de nous plonger dans l'histoire maintenant mythique de Gordon Freeman.
Пропустил в свое время, каюсь. Всем сыграть обязательно, как прочесть Пушкина.

Продолжение Half-Life 2, единственным минусом которого является неприлично маленькая продолжительность! Даже самый неторопливый игрок завершит ep1 менее чем за 3 часа.
В остальном же - ещё более красивый, более интересный, и просто более крутой Half-Life 2 (хотя казалось бы - куда уж более?)
This game is incredibly boring, which is a surprise since HL2 was a really great game.

Многие помнят эту игру, еще в детстве, тогда она еще была на Source7 (в 2010 перенесли на новый движок Source24). На тот момент игра очень впечатляла возможностями. Да и сейчас мало кто сможет сказать что она проста. Лично я с радостью переиграл её, многое понмнил еще со старой версии, графика относительно которой заметно выросла (как минимум на момент издания первой версии, слово шейдеры было чем то неизвестным и над ними только начинали работать). Всем советую погамать в HL2, начиная с HL2 потом HL2 Episode One и соответственно HL2 Episode Two. Сюжеты игр взаимосвязаны. Возможно в скором будущем напишу рецензию, со всеми соответствующими ремарками. ENJOY!
Купить! Играть! Качать и снова играт! Half-Life думаю этим всё сказано!
Disturbing lack of Darth Maul

In one way this is the worst of the Half Life franchise, but that said the Half Life series is one of my favourite ones and I still highly recommend this Episode.

You got nothing new from the moment you left your Buggy until the end of HL2 in this Episode, so a bit of "platform strategy" or vulgo "recycling" as we sadly know to well from other sequels, but still enjoyable.

There are not many novelties, but the ones like the "Zombines" and flares are welcome and add well to the existing HL2 world.

Graphics are defo a step forward compared to HL2. As far as the story goes, this is really just a connection between HL2 and Episode 2 and nothing terribly new or exciting will be revealed, but by no means boring.

You got a bit of citadel and super gravity gun action, combined with a hint of Ravenholm in the dark, Sandtraps w/o pheromones and lots of City 17. 

Buy it.

Half Life 2: Episode One erweitert die Story von Half Life 2 mit ca. 8 weiteren Spielstunden, kommt für mich aber nicht ganz an das Spielerlebnis von Half Life 2 und Half Life 2: Episode Two heran. Trotzdem lohnt es sich und für alle Half-Life Fans ist es natürlich ein Muss! :D
It was fun doing all these achievs.

Now i was a HUGE fan of half life 2 almost everything in thing in that game was amazing but the ending sucked and i wanted more and so valve the company we all know and love gave us half life 2 episode 1 and i must say i had almost no hype i thought this would be nothing compared to half life 2 and even though it is not better than half life 2 it is still spectaculler and it is THE 2nd BEST DLC RIGHT BEHIND half life 2 episode 2 witch is even better but half life 2 episode 1 has alex in the game more than we thought she would be and that is the best new addition to this game because she was awesome she actully was a relly good ai parter anyway u play as gorden freeman trying to escape city 17 with alex the voice acting is great as well as the graphics with are amazing this is the best looking of the half life saga know the only really big negtive is there no new guns or for that matter no new anything b ut truly this game did not need new shit the game is awesome enogh already the final verdic for me is a very impressive 8/10 a must own for anyone that liked half life 2

I LOVE IT!

Лучшая игра))
Quite a good little journey. The whole thing made me almost feel like I was in an interactive movie. Great pace and frequency of the scripted scenes

Никому не интересно, но все же расскажу, что данное дополнение попало на мой PC задолго после того, как был пройден Episode Two. И вполне вероятно, что этот первый эпизод я сравнивал со вторым, который был более совершенным как с технической, так и геймплейной точки зрения. И сравнение было явно не в пользу первого эпизода.

Согласно мой статистики, полное прохождение этого эпизода заняло у меня менее трех часов, и это при том, что я еще не сильно торопился и пытался получить какие-то ачивки. Благо, особого челленджа игра не предлагает, заблудиться где-либо практически невозможно, а боеприпасов хватает с головой.

Что в итоге получилось: хорошее связующее между событиями HL2 и HL2:ep2, но не слишком увлекательно и мало всего. Твердых 7 подствольных гранат из 10 гравипушек.

I felt this was too short.  Even for an episodic model this was over quickly.  

If you can catch this on sale for a few bucks grab it, otherwise skip it and read up the wiki.

B
It is a game that has images and sound and music. It also has colors and a plot. It is good.

This is a truly brilliant game which takes the Half Life 2 formula and refines it with varied and constantly enjoyable gameplay. The characters are brilliantly portrayed and I really started to feel attached to them by the end of the game. It is short but i feel its to be expected considering its named episode 1. There is very little to critisise about this game... its totally bug free, runs well on most hardware and has HDR which looks very nice indeed if you have the hardware to enable it. I could only wish for a few more weapons, enemies and perhaps a vehicle scene. I recommend it!
Супер игра. Как и все остальные части. Халф-Лайф. Советую ВСЕМ!

Those darn headcrabs!

EPISODE 1 starts immediately where Half-Life 2 ended. Basically it’s more of the same, and that’s more than welcome to a fan like me. If you want to know what I thought of HL2 I refer the reader to that review. Suffice it to say I loved it and Episode 1, although not as memorable as its predecessor, is still enormous fun to play. The only criticism I have of this episode is that Valve haven’t given the narrative development as much thought as they did in HL2 and will do again in HL2 Episode 2. Still great fun though.

4/5

Tout simplement éblouissant ! Un must-have pour les fans d'Half-life et les fans de zombie shooter.

Points forts:
-Scénario superbe 
-Plus axé sur le combat
-Mineure évolution du moteur source mais reste agréable
-Nouveaux monstres: Zomtels et Stalker
-Contrôle des lamineurs

Points faibles:
-Plûtot court
-Peu d'originalité
-Pas de "grandes innovations" 
-Chapitre 3 juste horrible !!!

Mon avis:
Pour les fans d'Half-life, il vous le faut ! Maintenant ! Mais pour ceux qui cherchent un bon jeu sans aimer spécialement les autres half-life, ne le prenez pas.

Great add-on to the Half-Life series and Half-Life 2.  Its quick and dirty.  I have yet to play episode 2, but episode 1 does well at explaining and setting up what happenes immediately after HL2.  Plus you get to see how City 17 fares.

Also, when you get to the ending, keep the camera looking straight or a little up, cook some popcorn and enjoy!

Only play this for the storyline or if you're a hardcore HL fan. There's only a couple chapters (the last one is just a teaser for HL2: ep.2), the order in which you aquire guns is way outa' whack (you only get the crowbar towards the end of the game), and the "Lowlife" (third chapter) levels are more of an annoyance than a theme. There's only one gunship and strider in this game that you get to fight and in terms of new enemies, all you get is the zombine. Going back to the lack of chapters, I'd like to point out that even if you're not speedrunning, you can beat this game in about three hours.

Why this gets an 80+ MetaCritic rating I have no idea. I'd give it a 6/10; VALVE really messed this one up.
An amazing continuation on from the story of Half-Life 2!

Great expansion to the original golden sequel with GREATLY improved a.i and ally contribuation. Yes it's short but it should be looked at as a extension of the game and not a seperate entity. Plenty of new things to do with much of the old still included. Classic.

I really was wainting a better game. it pains me talk like that of a Half Life game, but that is the truth. This game 2 hours playing and all I can say is, the plot is boring, you just run through a ruined factory, or whatever, using only the gravity gun. For God sake, why you need to pass more than one hour using only the gravity gun, what sucks as a weapon, when every enemy is using a machine gun?!! Their weapons simple vanish preventing you from getting it. The gravity gun should be like the kinetic in Dead Space, a bad and slow weapon used only you are out of ammo, just like the classic crowbar. If you only will give me only the bad weapon, give me my crowbar! And when you finally get you gun, the alien zombie enemies, that don't shoot you, begins to appears. It means, the game can have you using the gravity gun against armed soldiers, but you need a gun to fight unarmed aliens. Very logical!

Half Life 1 is one of the best games I ever played, I really though that Half Life 2 was inferior into everything, with exception of graphics, than the first one, but still playable, beatable and funny. But this third one, is too weak, it is boring, have parts the that piss you off. For exemple, the part of elevator that wreckage falls from the ceiling, and you are supose to shoot that before it falls, but they end uo falling and breaking the elevator too fast for you to get a shock orb (or whatever that is) and shoot them in the falling wreckage, and the gravity gun has too little range to shoot them directly in time. I needed to repeat that many time until I finally got the way, and the next part, you are supose to grab a computer out of the way with the gravity and shoot a shock orb, but there is no indication that you can grab that, and that is a major flaw of the gravity gun, you never know when you can shoot the gravity repeller, or grab any thing, and when it decides you can shoot, doesn't mean you can grab, this takes me to other part of the game that sucks, when the train crashes. There you can shoot anywhere, but can grab nothing, I needed a walkthrough to figure out that I needed to grab the soldier that was attacking the girl, and drag him out for she to escape, until there I was only shooting him, what more should I think? The gun shoots, the thing is attacking, so shoot him.

Anyway, being Half Life doesn't make a good game, the Valve should had it tested to the end before launching, and correcting this problems, and rethink the idea.

Half-Life 2 была продана в количестве 4 миллионов копий по всему миру и получила свыше 35 наград «Игра года». Episode One — первая игра в серии, которая продолжает сюжет Half-Life 2 и предлагает выйти за пределы Сити-17. Также содержит две мультиплеерных игры. Half-Life 2 не требуется.
